original_text: When Jehu had finished offering the sacrifices, he said to the guards and the soldiers, ‘Go into the temple and kill all Baal's servants. Do not let any of them escape.’ So the guards and soldiers used their swords to cut all the people down. They threw the dead bodies out of the temple. Then they went into the inside room of the temple.
korean_text: 번제 드리기를 다하매 예후가 호위병과 지휘관들에게 이르되 들어가서 한 사람도 나가지 못하게 하고 죽이라 하매 호위병과 지휘관들이 칼로 그들을 죽여 밖에 던지고

sentences.original_text: When Jehu had finished offering the sacrifices
he said to the guards and the soldiers
Do not let any of them escape
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누구도 도망치지 못하게 하라

sentences.original_text: So the guards and soldiers used their swords
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 경비병들과 군사들은 그들의 검을 사용했다

sentences.original_text: to cut all the people down
They threw the dead bodies out of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 죽은 시체들을 성전 밖으로 던졌다

sentences.original_text: Then they went into the inside room of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그러고 나서 그들은 성전의 안쪽 방으로 들어갔다
